overview: 1944. Primo Arcovazzi is a fanatical and dim-witted Fascist militiaman who accepts to escort an opponent of the regime to Rome in the hope to be promoted—still oblivious as ever to the nearing end of the regime. Travelling by sidecar through an Italy ravaged by war, the two will manage to build up some kind of comradeship in spite of their differences.
title: The Fascist
